docs.lead_paragraph: MR. CHAIRMAN, my Lords [loud laughter, in which Mr. Shaw joined heartily], ladies and gentlemen [renewed laughter]: Of late years the public have been trying to tackle me in every way they possibly can, and failing to make anything of it they have turned to treating me as a great man.

headline.main: BERNARD SHAW LECTURES AN ERRANT WORLD; Full Text of His Speech at His Seventieth Birthday Celebration, Held by Labor Party -- Author Lays Theoretical Basis for Saving Civilization

docs.abstract: Tribute to G B Shaw, sketch
